strapiPost.title: Artists Wanted For Upcoming ART WALK In Downtown Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Downtown Springdale is looking for artists from all creative backgrounds to join the upcoming ART WALK on April 27-29.

  • Downtown display: Presented by Downtown Springdale Alliance and Baldwin Shell, ART WALK is a self-guided tour of exhibitions and entertainment hosted in the various galleries, museums, makersâ€™ spaces, and boutiques in Downtown Springdale. 
  • Show off: Showcase your creativity or encourage an artistic friend to get their work in front of others during this engaging, community-oriented event. 

Apply by March 17 HERE.
